name: Video Games
description:
Hey everyone !

This is our LD#40 jam entry made in 48h  with @PizzaTotinos where the theme was "The more you have, the worse it is". Feel free to rate us and dont hesitate to give us your feedback :)

Features

  • Try to play multiple games at once ! Multitasking at its finest !
  • Beat the high score and be the first one on the online leaderboard !

Controls

  • You can play either with a keyboard or a controller
  • You can use WASD or the arrow keys to move
  • The action button is Space, E or the common Action button on a controller (ex : A on a XBox controller)
  • Press O to skip tutorial
